shortdesc.ph: Callback for video frame rendering events.
Callback for video frame rendering events.

p.codeblock: virtual void onVideoRenderingTracingResult(uid_t uid, MEDIA_TRACE_EVENT currentEvent, VideoRenderingTracingInfo tracingInfo)
public void onVideoRenderingTracingResult(int uid, Constants.MEDIA_TRACE_EVENT currentEvent, VideoRenderingTracingInfo tracingInfo)

section.p: After calling or joining a channel, the SDK triggers this callback to report video frame rendering events and various metrics during rendering. You can optimize these metrics to improve the rendering efficiency of the first video frame.

After calling the method or joining the channel, the SDK triggers this callback to report video frame rendering events and various metrics during rendering. You can optimize these metrics to improve the efficiency of the first frame rendering.

section.title: Trigger Timing
section.p: Triggered after calling or joining a channel.
